snippet: West Bromwich Albion are likely to hand the Premier League's oldest outfield player Gareth McAuley a new contract, manager Tony Pulis said ahead of Saturday's clash with Crystal Palace....

headline.main: McAuley Closing In on New West Brom Deal
headline.print_headline: McAuley Closing In on New West Brom Deal

lead_paragraph: West Bromwich Albion are likely to hand the Premier League's oldest outfield player Gareth McAuley a new contract, manager Tony Pulis said ahead of Saturday's clash with Crystal Palace.
